summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Nexus HR application focusing on specific requirements. All core functionality is working perfectly including login, dashboard stats, leave balance display with full names, attendance marking, and bulk import/export features.
passed_tests: Login with admin@nexushr.com / Admin@123 works perfectly
Dashboard loads with all required stats (Total Employees: 1, Present Today: 1, On Leave: 0, Pending Approvals: 0)
Dashboard shows leave balances with FULL NAMES (Casual Leave, Sick Leave, Privilege Leave, Maternity Leave) instead of codes
Attendance Punch In/Out buttons are present and functional on dashboard
Bulk Import page loads successfully at /dashboard/import
Download CSV template for employees works (API confirmed)
Download CSV template for attendance works (API confirmed)
Download CSV template for salary works (API confirmed)
Export All Employees button works (API and UI confirmed)
All backend APIs working (100% success rate - 19/19 tests passed)
Dashboard navigation and sidebar functionality works
Leave balance display shows proper full names as required
Bulk import page shows all three import sections (Employee Data, Attendance Records, Salary Structures)
Template download buttons are available for all import types
Upload functionality is present for all import types
Import instructions and important notes are clearly displayed
